snippet: The move by Nordstrom reflects a larger trend among department stores who are seeking to attract a younger audience through partnerships.
abstract: Nordstrom is bringing in apparel by Topshop, the British fast-fashion chain with rock 'n' roll flair; move by Nordstrom reflects a larger trend among department stores that are seeking to attract a younger audience through partnerships.
lead_paragraph: The move by Nordstrom reflects a larger trend among department stores who are seeking to attract a younger audience through partnerships.

headline.print_headline: Nordstrom, in an Unlikely Alliance, Is to Carry Topshop Apparel
